data.name: PolyJunk
data.description: PolyJunk is a decentralized application (DApp) built on the Polygon blockchain. It allows users to trade digital collectibles.

data.name: PolySwap
data.description: PolySwap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) on the Polygon network, allowing users to swap various tokens with low fees and fast transactions.

data.name: Polygon
data.description: Polygon (previously Matic Network) is a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum, aiming to provide faster and cheaper transactions.
